price: (105) And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.[855]
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا
footnotes: [855]- Once they have been reduced to dust.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
